name: （尘沙惑设定集）Lost in Secular Love - Concept Design Works
detailed_description:
This DLC is digital version of background design settings for game Lost in Secular Love. It is not recommend to read it until endings clear as it is content spolier. This DLC is Simplified Chinese version.
A total of 64 pages content which including:
* Game strategy guide
* Bonus images
* Character Details (character's gossip yo!)
* Story screen appreciate
* Design idea behind the scenes
* 4 folds table comic
* Special episode fiction
PS: Because the e-book software with .exe is easy to be identified as virus by anti-virus software in the test, so we saved as .pdf format.

short_description:
This DLC is digital version of background design settings for game Lost in Secular Love. It is not recommend to read it until endings clear as it is content spolier. This DLC is Simplified Chinese version.
A total of 64 pages content which including:
* Game strategy guide
* Bonus images
* Character Details (character's gossip yo!)
* Story screen appreciate
* Design idea behind the scenes
* 4 folds table comic
* Special episode fiction
PS: Because the e-book software with .exe is easy to be identified as virus by anti-virus software in the test, so we saved as .pdf format.
For players who want to collect entity edition can leave comments in the game DLC and game comment area. We will choose buyers who leave highlight comments to give entity version periodically.
PS: ↑ If you think your luck belongs to bad luck group you can purchase entity version directly at Taobao. Type 'Yetu avg' '夜兔avg' in search and then you can buy entity version.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1000MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Memory 128Mb
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in Sound Card
